extendedInfo.description: Plays, discovers, and downloads music-wherever your day takes you.The eMusic Android App is two music experiences in one app. And you don't even have to be an eMusic subscription member to use it. It's a convenient way for you to manage, play, and dig deeper into any music you keep on your Android device. The eMusic Android App also helps you discover new music based on your unique tastes - which will lead you to the music you'll love.Not an eMusic subscription member? Here's what you get:- NEW: Purchase and download music as you go at regular prices- Listen to any MP3 files stored on your Android device through the music player- Get song recommendations based on your listening habits- Create playlists tailored to your every mood- Browse an artist's dossier (discographies, biographies, photos, features, and related artists) while you listen to music- Access eMusic's unique charts- Search eMusic's catalog and listen to track samplesIf you are an eMusic subscription member, you can also:- Purchase and download music for 25-50% off regular prices- Listen to eMusic Radio (available to U.S. members only)- Use our Save for Later function to bookmark music you'd like to purchase- Access account detailsThe app is optimized for Android v2.3.3 or newer, with 1GHz and 576MB RAM.

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: This is a terrible app.  I have to sign in over and over again, even when attempting to change from one station to another within the app. And it does not include any of the functionality of the website, no \"saved\" lists, etc. Worst of all it continues the website\'s completely awful recommendations. I never buy pop or rap or metal and the only recommendations I ever get from emusic are pop and rap and metal. Years ago emusic had a great recommendation engine. Not any more.
reviews.author: Mario Aieta

reviews.title: Package file in valid!
reviews.comment: Won\'t install gave one star cause I have to.
reviews.author: william ferguson jr

reviews.title: Replaced phone & can\'t re-download albums
reviews.comment: I purchased an album and it synced perfectly. Then my phone broke and I can\'t get the files on my replacement phone. Fix this problem and get five stars.
reviews.author: Anthony Dilley

reviews.title: Cheap, Cheap
reviews.comment: I use the website and is cheap (price wise)
reviews.author: Zack Sheets

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This app will not play any artist that you are looking for says unavailable
reviews.author: Alan Blus

reviews.title: Rickys mine :3\342\231\245
reviews.comment: this app is awsome yhu cant download them but yhu have your list && yhu can listen for as long as yhu want amazing like him q: >Ricky \342\231\245
reviews.author: Evelynn Fuentes

reviews.title: Emusic
reviews.comment: LOVE IT!!!!
reviews.author: Lori Jean Milam

reviews.title: Whats with the billing info?
reviews.comment: Ive had this app for a long time, and its been great. But all of the sudden when I go to download a song, I have to put in name, address, and credit card number?! Why now?? I hate this update...please go back to how it was.
reviews.author: Ellie Wicks-Miranda

reviews.title: Forever crashing
reviews.comment: Used to be barely average, now very poor. Clunky and unreliable, slow to respond. Downloads crash the app so what\'s the point of the app?
reviews.author: clive knapper

reviews.title: Combine with browser...
reviews.comment: ...and the functionality would be VG.  Like how albums are listed on here, but overall browser info is better - incl. past purchases. Prefer browser search, but downloads work much better on the app (on my HTC phone) than the DL Mgr.  A little awkward switching between both when planning a DL, but happy to jettison the DL Mgr.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Rose

reviews.comment: Terrible app!  Crashes, can\'t download anything!
reviews.author: Mark White

reviews.title: Pretty good actually!
reviews.comment: I have had no trouble with this app at all.  Downloading on my wifi is quick and the interface is nice.  There are only 2 things I don\'t like about it - firstly that you are forced to search by artist meaning you can\'t explore a genre.  Secondly that when you press the back button on your phone from a track\'s page it returns you to the root search results rather than to the album track list.  Fix these and it will be 5*
reviews.author: Howard Flett

reviews.title: TERRIBLE!
reviews.comment: Canceled my account due to being unable to download songs and the servers constantly being down...was refused a refund and customer service was basically useless....don\'t download
reviews.author: Jillian Diveley

reviews.title: Can\'t download Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Downloaded one song and then it won\'t download. You have to pay monthly but if you don\'t download anything account goes to $0 at end of month. I am sure there is something better.
reviews.author: Alicia Hadden

reviews.title: good interface.. but where\'s the music?
reviews.comment: easy to use interface,  hard to find songs as you can only search by artist. there\'s hardly any choice of mainstream music, I thought it was due yo having the trial so I paid the 10 pounds and nothing changed. it\'s mostly indi music that not many care about therefore if you\'re mainstream fan do not waste your money on this app/website as it\'s bad.   downloading the awful music that is on emusic is simple via this app and thats why I can\'t really be just negative as there is one or two positive points
reviews.author: Crix Gallo

reviews.title: Great updates!
reviews.comment: EDIT: It\'s easy to see that eMusic has put a lot of effort into this application since my review. The UI is a lot better now and downloads are put into separate folders and the filenames are correct. I\'ve always thought that the emusic website had a fantastic design and the native android application is catching up fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not their best
reviews.comment: I have used eMusic for years, and have always been pleased with the service. This new app is a sore disappointment. It never seems to be able to contact the server so I can almost never download from my saved list or even see my music history on the first try. I hope they get the bugs out of this son.
reviews.author: Lem Wilson

reviews.title: Unable to download music
reviews.comment: Tried to download a song, but, it keeps telling me that I need wifi, my wifi is on, what\'s the problem?
reviews.author: Nancy Hanson

reviews.title: No sync
reviews.comment: I\'ve used eMusic as my only subscription service for years. The service used to be great, but has definitely taken a step backward. I used FOSS on my last phone, and liked it. This official app leaves a lot to be desired. No sync with previous purchase. Download failures. Decent, but not great.
reviews.author: Kimberly Doss-Cortes

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Terrible app. No good music of any genre, search output is useless - comes up with irrelevant bands and incorrect information. Downloads dont work either. \302\243 25 a month? Get stuffed!
reviews.author: Leigh Frost
